Anyone who knows if/how it's possible to run it in 1440 x 900?

Yes it is?
Every id software too

Just change file "q3config.cfg" in textedit

seta r_mode "-1"
seta r_fullscreen "1"
seta r_customaspect "1"
seta r_customheight "900"
seta r_customwidth "1440"
seta r_colorbits "32"
seta r_texturebits "32"
seta r_depthbits "24"
seta r_stencilbits "8"
Any idea if this works with PPC and Tiger?

Awsome, i had never played Quake before (or any other FPS computergames for that matter) but my friends want to have a lan-party so i said i would learn to play. I suck of course but it sure is fun to blast of at some alienskeleton :)

Gonna keep seedin, this is a good one.

@phiebs

I would also like to know where q3config.cfg is in THIS release. Does anyone know??

Q3A writes a config file if you don't create it yourself. It stores a config file for each "mod" in the mod's home folder. For straight Q3A I believe it stores it in the "Base3Q" folder.

What I wnt to know is why the Uploader didn't tell us what version it is??? There's like 20 or 30 different revisions to this game. I have 3 different ones installed on my Mac Pro 8-core and they all work real smooooth! :)
